results.title: Like water for chocolate = Como agua para chocolate
results.creator_credit: Alfonso Arau and Arau Films International
results.brief_description: Multi-award winning Mexican film which tells the story of Tita who is forbidden by tradition and a tyrannical mother to marry Pedro. Tita finds solace for her suppressed passion and sorrow in her cooking, which has a profound effect on all who partake. Based on Laura Esquivel’s best-seller, “Like water for chocolate” is an enchanting film which radiates warmth and emotional depth. It is visual feast starring Marco Leonardi, Lumi Cavazos and Regina Torne. Spanish dialogue. English subtitles.

results.title: The French lieutenant's woman (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Karel Reisz, Leon Clore and Juniper Films
results.brief_description: Based on the brilliant novel by John Fowles, with the screenplay written by Harold Pinter, “The French Lieutenant’s Woman” is both a classic Victorian love story and an ironic look at an age of double-standard morality. Sarah Woodruff’s chance meeting with Charles Smithson, a young man-about-town who subsequently discards his pretty young fiancee in a wave of passion, sets in motion a series of events that disrupts the quiet fishing and seaside village in England, and profoundly affects the lives of its residents.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Karel Reisz, Leon Clore and Juniper Films

results.title: Excalibur
results.creator_credit: John Boorman and Orion Pictures Corporation
results.brief_description: The story of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table has inspired people for centuries. Arthur (Nigel Terry) has removed the magic sword Excalibur from the sacred stone and sets out to reunite the land as its King. Helen Mirren is the beautiful but sinister Morganna, Arthur’s half-sister, and Nicol Williamson is Merlin. This timeless tale includes the search for the Holy Grail and the tragic love of Guinevere and Lancelot. Cast also includes Nicholas Clay, Cherie Lunghi, Paul Geoffrey.

results.title: The Blue lotus
results.creator_credit: Stephane Bernasconi, Robert Rea, Ellipse and Nelvana
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Adventures of Tintin”.
In the midst of a battle with smugglers, Tintin arrives in China, where he rescues a drowning Chang, a real-life friend of Herge who developed “The Adventures of Tintin”. Tintin must use all his courage, daring and intelligence to outsmart the traps of his enemies.

results.title: Kolyma
results.creator_credit: Murray Battle, Angus MacQueen, Tom Roberts, BBC and October Films
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “The Hand of Stalin”.
Kolyma is in North-East Russia, on the wild Pacific Coast and under Stalin’s reign it was a Gulag prison camp. The Gulags were a network of forced labour-camps throughout the Soviet Union and literally tens of millions of Soviet citizens were imprisoned in the camps during the 1930s and 1940s. Kolyma is a gold mine territory and the prisoners were forced to work the mines, clear the forests while enduring horrific climatic conditions in the freezing Siberian terrain. Interviews with ex-prisoners who served sentences ranging from ten to twenty-five years, detail the miserable conditions in which they lived and worked, while interviews with the camp administrators make it clear that throughout the prison system it was wide-spread knowledge that the majority of prisoners where innocent of their crimes. This final episode of “The Hand of Stalin” documents with ferocious passion, the damage done by a totalitarian ruler in his thirst for personal power and by his blind adherance to the dogmas of a Communist faith.

results.title: Spirits of the forest; Year of the Gagadju
results.creator_credit: David Parer, Ivo Burum, Jeremy Hogarth, ABC-TV (Australia) and Papua New Guinea. Wildlife, Division of
results.brief_description: Spirits of the forest looks at the Birds of Paradise in Papua New Guinea and the unique relationship they have with the highlanders. The people believe they gain the special qualities of the birds by wearing their feathers in ceremonies. This episode was written by David Attenborough. “Year of the Gagadju” looks at Kakadu as the traditional homeland of the Gagadju tribe. This is an account of how they divide the year into six seasons, reading the changes around them. The Gagadju are determined that their traditional culture will not be lost for future generations. Both programs are narrated by Sandy Gore.

results.title: Bananas in pyjamas: surf's up
results.creator_credit: Di Drew, Tammy Burnstock and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: B1 and B2, are the much loved “Bananas in Pyjamas” who get up to a little mischief and lots of fun with their friends “The Teddies” on Cuddles Avenue. The ten fun-filled stories featuring the Bananas, the Teddies and a giant rat called “Rat in a hat” are: “Surf’s up”, “Dancing shoes”, “King rat”, “Snow storm”, “Say cheese”, “Spring clean”, “Rat post”, “Model bananas”, “Rat wash” and “Super bananas”.

results.title: Italianissimo 2: intermediate: a multimedia course for learning Italian
results.brief_description: This set of audio cassettes contain all the conversations from the course book as well as ten profile interviews recorded in Italy for the course. Learners are encouraged to take part in the conversational activities intended to develop their ability to understand and speak Italian. The cassettes are designed to be used with the course book, but can be used independently. The course book and videos may be borrowed as separate loan items.

results.title: Ecosystems
results.creator_credit: Robin Wischusen, ABC-TV (Australia) and Victorian College of Agriculture and Horticulture
results.brief_description:
Episode number 10 of Series “Growing awareness: Factors in plant production”.
Growers face conflicting interests - the need to grow plants economically and the need to ensure against long-term destructive environmental consequences. Four case studies feature four different ecosystems: 1. Managing a National Park - preserving the natural features while allowing public access 2. Agro-forestry - the combination of timber production and agriculture 3. Parwan Valley - where a local Landcare group is working to restore the environmental balance 4. An Urban Bushland environment.
